mapper.insert: insert into HOT_WORD (UUID, HOT_WORD, STATUS, CREATE_USER_UUID, CREATE_DATE, MODI_USER_UUID, MODI_DATE) values (#{uuid},#{hotWord},#{status},#{createUserUUID},#{createDate},#{modiUserUUID},#{modiDate});
mapper.update: update HOT_WORD set TIMES = TIMES + 1 , MODI_DATE = #{modiDate} where UUID = #{uuid} and ID = #{id} and TIMES = #{times} and HOT_WORD = #{hotWord}
mapper.select: select * from HOT_WORD where STATUS = '0' and DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') order by TIMES desc LIMIT 10

SELECT HOT_WORD, SUM(TIMES) AS TIMES FROM HOT_WORD WHERE DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') > DATE_FORMAT( DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL #{times} DAY), '%Y-%m-%d' ) GROUP BY HOT_WORD ORDER BY TIMES DESC LIMIT 10
